title: Trump says ICE raids 'haven't gone far enough'
shortDescription: Trump's crackdown in the name of addressing illegal immigration and violent crime has divided Americans and launched a series of legal challenges.

title: Trump to speak at election eve GOP rallies in VA, NJ: live updates
shortDescription: Candidates for governor in New Jersey and Virginia, and for mayor of New York City, campaigned in the final hours before the Nov. 4 election.

title: Majority of Americans blame Trump for 'poor' economy in new poll
shortDescription: More than 7 in 10 Americans say current economic conditions in the country are "poor" or "very poor in a new CNN/SSRS poll.

title: Trump defends ICE on '60 Minutes'
shortDescription: Trump backed ICE tactics, slammed Democrats, and warned China over Taiwan in CBS' '60 Minutes' interview.

title: 'I'm a much better looking person.' Trump swipes Mamdani as NYC votes
shortDescription: In the wide-ranging interview, President Donald Trump said he preferred former Gov. Andrew Cuomo to Mamdani, the Democratic nominee leading the race.

title: Judge in Portland extends block on Trump's National Guard deployment
shortDescription: A federal judge in Portland extended her block against Trump's National Guard deployment.

title: Government shutdown updates: Trump admin will partially pay for SNAP benefits
shortDescription: With the country nearing the record for the longest government shutdown in U.S. history, the stalemate over federal funding has continued.

title: Trump calls on Democrats to end shutdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Sunday (November 2) called on Democrats to end the U.S. government shutdown telling reporters, "all they have to do is open up the country."

title: Our Constitution defines 3 equal, but separate branches of government
shortDescription: With 6 conservatives, SCOTUS has been very friendly toward Trump's expansion of power.

title: Are banks, post offices, UPS, FedEx open on Election Day? What we know
shortDescription: Will banks and post offices be open on Election Day? Here's what we know about what will be open on Tuesday, Nov. 4.

title: Trump voters for Mamdani? What to watch in NYC mayor's race
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani needs inroads among Black voters who favored Andrew Cuomo, Latinos who swung to Trump and Jewish voters who may disagree over Israel.

title: Trump talks ICE, US-China relations in wide-ranging '60 Minutes' interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said immigration officials "haven't gone far enough" despite criticism, and that China won't attack Taiwan.

title: Trump says he will not attend Supreme Court tariff case arguments
shortDescription: Trump told reporters he wouldn't attend the Supreme Court arguments on the legality of his tariffs because he didn't want to interfere with the case.

title: Trump held 'Great Gatsby'-themed Halloween party on eve of SNAP cutoff
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held a "Roaring 20's" themed party as food aid for 42 million low-income Americans was set to expire.

title: Trump threatens military action in Nigeria
shortDescription: President Trump instructed "our Department of War to prepare for possible action" against the Nigerian government over "the killing of Christians."

title: Trump's disapproval rises in new poll, but Americans call Dems 'out of touch'
shortDescription: In a new Washington Post/ABC News/Ipsos poll, Trump's disapproval rating jumped to a level not seen since its January 2021 survey.

title: 7 big questions hanging over Election Day 2025
shortDescription: Off-year races in Virginia, New Jersey, California and beyond are seen as key early barometers of how voters are feeling about Trump and Democrats.

title: Meet the businesses taking on Trump's tariffs at the Supreme Court
shortDescription: President Trump argues his sweeping tariffs will bring jobs back to the United States. The businesses challenging the tariffs say they're doing more harm than good.
